author: IGN
description:
From the hearts and minds of Stephen King and Mike Flanagan comes The Life of Chuck, the extraordinary story of an ordinary man. This unforgettable, genre-bending tale celebrates the life of Charles 'Chuck' Krantz as he experiences the wonder of love, the heartbreak of loss, and the multitudes contained in all of us.

#IGN #Movies
title: The Life of Chuck - Official Teaser Trailer (2025) Tom Hiddleston, Matthew Lillard

author: IGN
description:
In today's Daily Fix:
In an ongoing lawsuit regarding Ubisoft's shutdown of the online racing game, The Crew, Ubisoft is insisting that customers don't own the games they buy, instead they're purchasing a license to play those games. Ubisoft claims that legal print in the The Crew, as well as on the packaging of physical copies, clearly state that Ubisoft can shutdown the game with 30 days' notice. This could have larger ramifications in the games industry, considering how many live-service games are already popular. In other news, The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom and Breath of the Wild will cost gamers a pretty penny if they're buying the Switch 2 enhanded editions from scratch. If you don't already own a Switch 1 copy of Breath of the Wild, a new Switch 2 version will cost a full $70, and DLC is not included (which is an extra $20). Current owners can upgrade for $10, and members of Nintendo Switch Online + Expansion Pack get it for free. And finally, kids are going absolu
title: Ubisoft Insists In Lawsuit That We Don't Own the Games We Buy - IGN Daily Fix

author: IGN
description: From the creator of Case Closed and WIT Studios comes a new anime series, YAIBA: Samurai Legend! YAIBA: Samurai Legend is streaming now on Netflix, Hulu, and Disney+.
title: YAIBA: Samurai Legend - Official Teaser Trailer (English Subtitles)

author: IGN
description:
The dreaded Worm Cult has returned, and once more Tamriel’s adventurers will need to gather their allies, new and old, to stop the cult and their terrible plans for the isle of Solstice. Your new ESO adventure begins here. Check out the latest The Elder Scrolls Online trailer to see the return of the Worn Cult and what you can expect with the return of these foes. 

The Elder Scrolls Online's 2025 Content Pass and 2025 Premium Edition are now available to purchase and include The Seasons of the Worm Cult Part 1, available on June 2 on PC and Mac, and on June 18 for Xbox and PlayStation.

#IGN #Gaming
title: The Elder Scrolls Online - Official Return of the Worm Cult Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Here's your look at the dark fantasy world of Ember and Blade in this exclusive announcement trailer for this upcoming game that blends survival-like gameplay with Soulslike combat elements. Ember and Blade is coming to PC via Steam in 2025. You can wishlist Ember and Blade on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3470500/Ember_and_Blade/

Set in a dark fantasy world, Ember and Blade follows the story of a demon hunter named Fenrix, who, on the brink of death, forms a pact with an angel to gain immortality. Players will journey through a sealed, forsaken realm to stop the resurrection of an ancient archdemon--facing overwhelming odds and unraveling the dark secret of a dying world.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Ember and Blade - Exclusive Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
With radiation levels spiking and sirens blaring, Outlanders must prepare for nuclear chaos. Check out the latest Vigor trailer to see what's coming in Season 22: Meltdown, which brings a new battle pass, collectible action figures, and a wardrobe preset system to the action shooter game. Vigor: Meltdown is available now.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Vigor: Meltdown - Official Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Larian Studios returns with their second installment of Devs React to Speedruns—this time featuring the full release of Baldur’s Gate 3. In this latest episode, key members of the development team observe their game being creatively and mercilessly beaten by speedrunner Mae.
In the video, Mae completes Baldur’s Gate 3—including all three acts—by leveraging a series of amusing bugs and clever exploits. The objective of the run is to finish the entire game, including all three acts, as quickly as possible.
To see more from speedrunner Mae, follow her on the platforms below:
https://www.twitch.tv/maeqc
https://www.youtube.com/@maeeeeeee
https://www.speedrun.com/users/maeeeeee
title: Baldur’s Gate 3 Developers React to 18-Minute Speedrun

author: IGN
description:
Based on Martha Wells' best-selling, Hugo and Nebula Award winning book series “The Murderbot Diaries,” “Murderbot” is a sci-fi thriller/comedy about a self-hacking security construct who is horrified by human emotion yet drawn to its vulnerable clients. Played by Skarsgård, Murderbot must hide its free will and complete a dangerous assignment when all it really wants is to be left alone to watch futuristic soap operas and figure out its place in the universe.

#IGN
title: Murderbot - Official Trailer (2025) Alexander Skarsgård | Apple TV+

author: IGN
description: Watch the Launch Trailer for The Last of Us Complete, a bundle of both The Last of Us Part 1 and The Last of Us Part 2 in one package developed by Naughty Dog. Players can purchase the critically and commercially acclaimed titles that include both The Last of Us Part I, including the story expansion Left Behind, as well as The Last of Us Part II Remastered, featuring the roguelike survival mode No Return, Lost Levels, and more. Experience the definitive versions of two award-winning games that went on to inspire The Last of Us HBO series. The Last of Us Complete is available now for PlayStation 5 (PS5).
title: The Last of Us Complete - Official Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Gameplay Overview Trailer for Tempest Rising, a base-building strategy game developed by Slipgate Ironworks. Players will command an array of factions in an Earth ravaged by nuclear war and struggling for power and resources. Take a look at the latest trailer to get the rundown on the game's mechanics, gameplay, and more the 90 's-inspired real-time strategy game has to offer. Tempest Rising is launching on April 24 for PC (Steam).

#Gaming #TempestRising #IGN

author: IGN
description:
1864, an uncharted island in the Arctic. Cabin boy Sam and loyal husky Ellie are stranded in the unforgiving cold. Endure the harsh elements, uncover a bleak mystery and find your way home and to yourself. Play solo as both characters or cooperatively with a friend. Your survival depends on your friendship! Check out the Ikuma: The Frozen Compass reveal trailer for a look at this upcoming game ahead of its launch on PC, PS5 (PlayStation 5), and Xbox Series X/S in 2026.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Ikuma: The Frozen Compass - Official Reveal Trailer | Triple-i Initiative Showcase 2025

Wield the full arsenal of Deep Rock Galactic, take on hordes of lethal aliens, mine riches, and unlock powerful upgrades. It’s one dwarf against all of Planet Hoxxes! Version 1.0 of Deep Rock Galactic: Survivor will be available on PC on September 17, 2025. It is currently available in Early Access on Steam.

author: IGN
description:
Here's your look at the vibrant world of Duskfade in this reveal trailer for this upcoming 3D action-platformer game. The Duskfade trailer shows gameplay and gives a peek at the adventure. Duskfade will be available on PS5 (PlayStation 5), Xbox Series X/S, and Steam in 2026. Embark on an unforgettable adventure as Zirian, a young workshop apprentice, as he sets out to restore time itself in a world enshrouded by eternal night. Shatter the shackles of time as you jump, swing and slash through a vibrant clockpunk world, blending nostalgia with modern gameplay in a timeless love letter to action-platformer classics.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Duskfade - Official Reveal Trailer | Triple-i Initiative Showcase 2025

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Frostrail reveal trailer for this upcoming FPS, open-world survival crafting game. The Frostrail reveal trailer shows gameplay, its harsh world, and the terrifying threats you'll have to fight. Frostrail will be availalbe in Steam Early Access for Windows PC in 2026.


Endure a desolate post-apocalyptic world with arctic temperatures, unspeakable horrors, and one life-sustaining locomotive powered by the impressive Eden Engine. Scavenge underground dungeons and crumbling ruins across the tundra while braving forces both natural and unnatural, slaying horrifying abominations known as Revenants in intense FPS battles. Collect vital resources, but stray from the train for too long and risk succumbing to the icy environment and its cursed inhabitants. The train is not just transportation, it is a home base, a moving fortress, and the one thing standing between you and a cold death. Band together with other survivors in 4-person online co-op for a greater chance against the
title: Frostrail - Official Reveal Trailer | Triple-i Initiative Showcase 2025

author: IGN
description:
Take control of one player on your team and compete in fast-paced 5v5 matches from an immersive third-person perspective. Team up with friends and dive into the action!
Rematch will be available on Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 5, and Steam on June 19th. Pre-order now for early access.
title: Rematch - Official Release Date Trailer | The Triple-i Initiative Showcase 2025

author: IGN
description:
Here's your look at gameplay from Into the Fire in this trailer for the upcoming disaster extraction survival game with arcade elements. Into the Fire will be available in Steam Early Access in 2025.


Into the Fire will have you braving fury of nature as you face volcanic demons on Dante's Archipelago. Armed with fantastic retro inventions and firefighting weapons, you will need to combat a deadly disaster and extract as many lives as possible in a time-pressing run for survival. Discover fiery myths, unexplained phenomena and mystery relics lurking within the inferno. Challenge the world of fire and ash—upgrade your gear, expand your base and take part in dark rituals as you fight against the volcano's wrath. Once its breath reaches you, every second counts.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Into the Fire - Official Gameplay Trailer | Triple-i Initiative Showcase 2025

author: IGN
description: Morbid Metal is an action-packed rogue-lite, in which players can shapeshift between 4 different characters in real-time, all with unique active abilities and stylish attacks. Rapidly switch characters and combine abilities to slaughter enemies in stylish fashion. Progress through stunning, semi-procedurally generated levels, fighting through hordes of enemies and powerful bosses in various environmental biomes, ranging from desolate wastelands of the far future, to the overgrown ruins of mankind.
title: Morbid Metal - Official Early Access Release Window Trailer | Triple-i Initiative Showcase 2025

author: IGN
description:
Join Will--the beloved shopkeeper by day, dungeon-crawler by night--on a new adventure when Moonlighter 2: The Endless Vault launches into Early Access in summer 2025. Moonlighter 2: The Endless Vault will be available on Windows PC, Steam, Game Pass, Xbox Series X/S, and PS5 (PlayStation 5). Check out the latest Moonlighter 1: The Endless Vault trailer for a peek at his adventure in this action RPG sequel. author: IGN
description:
Heroes of Might & Magic: Olden Era is a new installment of the renowned series of turn-based strategy games, where action takes place in the world of Enroth, on the continent of Jadame — mentioned but never explored in a Heroes of Might & Magic game before. Watch the new Heroes of Might & Magic: Olden Era trailer to learn more about the story and world of this upcoming game. Explore the land on the brink of chaos, where ancient rivalries ignite once more, unusual alliances are made and a dark force stirs beneath the surface.  Will you stop it in time? Heroes of Might & Magic: Olden Era will be available in Steam Early Access in summer 2025.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Heroes of Might & Magic: Olden Era - Official Release Window Trailer | Triple-i Initiative Showcase

author: IGN
description:
In Timberborn Update 7, the post-apocalyptic beavers are introducing the amazing concept of modular urban transit to their settlements. The Folktails will zipline through the wasteland, soaring high above the ground, while the Iron Teeth navigate through water-sealed tubeways. Since all beavers are skilled terraformers, in Update 7, they are expanding their capabilities beyond simply building dams. By layering dirt, they can now create hanging gardens, grow plants on rooftops, and even construct tunnels and artificial caves. 

Timberborn's Update 7 - Ziplines & Tubeways will be available on May 8, 2025!
title: Timberborn Update 7 - Official Ziplines & Tubeways Trailer | The Triple-i Initiative Showcase 2025

author: IGN
description:
Check out the opening moments of Blue Prince, captured in 4K on PlayStation 5 Pro. Blue Prince is a brand new puzzle game where every dawn unveils a new mystery. Navigate through shifting corridors and ever-changing chambers in this genre-defying strategy puzzle adventure. But will your unpredictable path lead you to the rumored Room 46? Blue Prince releases on PS5, Xbox Series X|S, and Steam on April 10th, 2025.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Blue Prince: First 18 Minutes of Gameplay (4K)

description:
Dino Path Trail gets a new trailer and a release date. Watch the latest Dino Path Trail trailer for this 3D Isometric Roguelike Survival shooter set in a Wild West world where dinosaurs never went extinct. The new trailer for Dino Path Trail shows gameplay and your mission through this dangerous world of dinosaurs and outlaws. Dino Path Trail will be available on May 9, 2025 on Steam.

author: IGN
description:
Into the Dead: Our Darkest Days is available now on PC and MAC via Steam Early Access. Watch the tense Into the Dead: Our Darkest Days Early Access launch trailer for this shelter survival game set in a zombie-infested Texas. 

Walton, Texas, 1980. Dealing with the sweltering summer heat isn’t easy. When a zombie outbreak erupts in the city, survival takes precedence over staying cool. With each passing day, the undead’s numbers increase, law and order slip away, and Walton’s remaining survivors must do everything possible to stay alive.

#Gaming #Games #IGN
title: Into the Dead: Our Darkest Days - Official Early Access Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Samsung and Xbox trailer featuring both brands collaborating to bring the power of games to all screens. Directed by David Fincher and Romain Chassaing, this trailer depicts a glimpse at the life of Horation, a rat who finds his humanity again with the power of Xbox gaming on a Samsung OLED TV. Xbox is available now on Samsung OLED TV's.

#Xbox #DavidFincher #Gaming
title: Xbox x Samsung - Official 'Wake Up' Trailer (Directed by David Fincher and Romain Chassaing)

author: IGN
description:
Watch the new Where Winds Meet trailer, announcing that the open-world action-adventure RPG set in ancient China developed by Everstone Studio is coming in 2025. Players will embody a youthful sword master on a quest to unravel the mystery behind their own nature. Dispatch an array of enemies and bosses as the winds propel an epic legendary journey. Where Winds Meet is launching in 2025 for PlayStation 5 (PS5) and PC with a closed beta test on May 16.

#WhereWindsMeet #Gaming #Games
title: Where Winds Meet - Official 'Coming 2025' Trailer (English Subtitles)

author: IGN
description:
In this snippet from Podcast Beyond 891, Jada and Akeem sat down with performance-capture actor, stuntman, and author of If These Fists Could Talk: A Stuntman's Unflinching Take on Violence, Eric Jacobus to talk about what it’s like bringing some of gaming’s most brutal actions to life, from punching like Kratos to performing Fatalities in Mortal Kombat without anyone getting hurt, Eric had a ton of insight. 

Watch the full epsiode of Podcast Beyond here! - https://youtu.be/SZm-RWukUD8?si=Nwvzl8G7INZLI5I6
title: It Just Hits Different: How Western and Japanese Games Tackle Mo-Cap Combat - Beyond Clips

author: IGN
description:
Welcome to IGN’s Rare Loot! We’re on a quest to uncover pop culture's ultimate holy grail collectibles. 

In this episode, we’re on the hunt for the legendary Nintendo 64 Pikachu Edition. This special edition console was released in 2000, near the end of the N64’s lifecycle, to coincide with the immense popularity of the Pokémon franchise. The console features a three-dimensional Pikachu sculpted on top, a power switch shaped like a Poké Ball, and a reset button located on Pikachu's foot. Best of all, when you turn on the console, Pikachu's cheeks light up.

We also discovered a rare complete-in-box copy of Pokémon Stadium. Developed by Game Freak for the Nintendo 64, Pokémon Stadium allowed players to battle all 151 Gen I Pokémon. The game came bundled with a Transfer Pak, an accessory that enabled you to play Pokémon Red, Blue, or Yellow on your TV using the Game Boy Tower Mode.

Plus, we found a rare Base Set Charizard from the Pokémon Trading Card Game. The Pokémon TCG was first
title: We Found a RARE Pikachu N64! - IGN Rare Loot

author: IGN
description:
IGN’s Akeem Lawanson sits down with the performance and voice actor of Assassin’s Creed Valhalla’s Eivor and Odin, Magnus Bruun, to discuss his performance in the Assassin’s Creed franchise, Klaus in the Call of Duty: Modern Warfare series, advice he might have for the actors of Naoe and Yasuke in Assassin’s Creed Shadows and so much more! 

#IGN #Gaming #AssassinsCreedShadows
title: AC Valhalla’s Eivor Has Some Advice For Assassin’s Creed Shadows’ Actors

author: IGN
description:
In this snippet from Podcast Beyond 891, One thing we don’t love is the announcement of a very Bloodborne-coded FromSoftware game that’s not a Bloodborne sequel or even coming to PlayStation. The Nintendo Switch 2-exclusive multiplayer game The Duskbloods looks cool, but with a lot of caveats. Speaking of soulsbornes involving blood and a very stylish horror aesthetic, Bloodborne turned 10 a couple weeks ago! We’re celebrating the milestone with a return to Yarnham in this month’s Beyond Game Club. 

This week’s show is Max Scoville, Jada Griffin, Tom Marks, and is produced by Nick Maillet
Watch the full epsiode of Podcast Beyond here! - https://youtu.be/SZm-RWukUD8?si=Nwvzl8G7INZLI5I6

#IGN #Gaming
title: Returning to Bloodborne after the Duskblood Reveal - Beyond Clips

author: IGN
description:
In this snippet from Unlocked 688, Michael and Ryan discuss the grossness and danger that Microsoft's new Copilot AI-powered Quake 2 tech demo introduces. Spoiler alert, it looks weird and plays about as well as one would think. You can also make enemies disappear by just looking away! 

This week’s show is Ryan McCaffrey, Michael Higham, and is produced by Nick Maillet
title: Microsoft's Copilot AI-Powered Quake 2 Tech Demo Is a Problem - Unlocked Clips

author: IGN
description:
Dive into the beautiful yet dangerous world of Everwind (formerly known as SkyVerse) in this new teaser trailer for the upcoming first-person voxel sandbox RPG. The Everwind trailer shows gameplay, exploration, combat, and threats you'll encounter in your adventure. Everwind will be available on PC.

author: IGN
description:
Here's your look at Tomo: Endless Blue in this announcement trailer for the upcoming voxel open-world, anime-style RPG set in a boundless ocean realm inhabited by mysterious creatures known as the Tomo. Tomo: Endless Blue will be available on PC.

When worlds end, fragments of their civilizations become islands adrift in the Endless Blue. As players embark on a journey to uncover the story of each procedurally generated island,they discover vibrant villages filled with characters and Tomo living their lives, every island and village a microcosm of a unique culture. 

Whether players want to battle alongside Tomo companions, build intricate vehicles and contraptions out of blocks, or live a cozy life with their friends, the world of the Endless Blue is theirs to discover.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Tomo: Endless Blue - Official Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
The arrival of the PlayStation in 1995 sent shockwaves through the games industry, but most of all it transformed the art of fear and suspense, and with it came the debut of two juggernauts of video game horror: Silent Hill and Resident Evil. In this clip from TerrorBytes: The Evolution of Horror Gaming, a new five-part documentary series exploring the rich history of horror in games, Silent Hill series alumni and a cast of other game developers and horror experts discuss what the original PlayStation meant for horror in games and how it enabled the perfect marriage of horror aesthetics and horror narrative in Silent Hill.

TerrorBytes is available now from http://terrorbytesdoc.com
title: Terrorbytes: The Evolution of Horror Gaming - Power of the PlayStation Clip (2025)
